original_title: 新 愛妻ダッチワイフ 波多野結衣
overview: This one old dude is married to Hatano Yui, a very beautiful wife, but he begins to have suspicions on her ability to remain faithful. So he hires a private investigator, who confirms Hatano is having fun on the side with a much younger man than her husband.  Knowing that the wife is a horny cheater was not the hardest part, as the hubby has a strange way to cope with the issue.
title: Wife New Love – Yui Hatano
